114592.en:
Hmm. You're tough, aren't you? You were burned so badly, but you're still alive and well. However, if you had
been left alone, you would have died for sure. You should be thankful to Estella.
114592.ja:

114593.en:
Are you the one the priest lady brought? You're still alive. That's good. Hmm? Are you going to pray to
the Dragon God? The god's shrine is to the east, outside the village.

114594.en:
You are going to pray to the Dragon
God, aren't you? The God's tower is
just outside the village to the east.

114595.en:
If I had been a little younger, one or two Darkflame would have been no match for me! Even the mightiest dragon
tribe can't overcome the passing of the years.

114596.en:
The well in the middle of the village started to blow fire instead of water long before I was born. This fountain
is the only place where water still comes in, but if it dries up, we will probably die.
114596.ja:

114597.en:
I wonder if Rezero and the others are
fighting Darkflame right now. I hope
everyone comes back safe and sound.

114598.en:
Oh, my God! What's with your appearance? Ah. I wonder if you are the traveler who was brought to the
chief? I guess you're not a dragon. Travelers like you come to this village often these days. Do you want
to pray to Nadraga? Then why don't you leave the village and go to the stronghold to the east?

114599.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>You want to pray to Nadraga? Then why
don't you just leave the village and
go to the sanctuary to the east?

114600.en:
Well, you know. This place is called Apeka Village. Gidda and his brothers have gone out for the day, so only
Grandma and Grandpa play with us.

114601.en:
We cannot say no to a request from the Priestess of the Nadraga Order. We will accept you. However, we will ask
you to follow the customs of the village. Leave the village and go east for a while to the old fortress. There
you will offer the Dragon Prayer to Nadraga and return here.
114601.ja:
ã€ŒãƒŠãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¬æ•™å›£ã®ç¥å®˜ã•ã¾ã«ã€€é ¼ã¾ã‚ŒãŸã¨ã‚ã£ã¦ã¯ ã€€æˆ‘ã€…ã‚‚ã€€ã„ã‚„ã¨ã¯è¨€ãˆã¾ã›ã‚“ã‹ã‚‰ãªã€‚ ã€€ã‚ãªãŸã‚’ã€€å—ã‘å…¥ã‚Œã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

114602.en:
My husband is also participating in the defeat of Darkflame. He is not as good as Rezero, but he is very proud
of his swordsmanship. I am sure he will defeat Darkflame.

114604.en:
Are you surprised to find a concierge? The World Innkeepers Association was quick to get information about other
worlds and started dispatching people to them! Wherever you are, the World Innkeepers Association will be there
to support you! So long.

114605.en:
Allmighty Alltrades said, ''Wherever there are adventurers, you must run to them. If you need to change jobs,
we're here for you.

114606.en:
I can't offer much hospitality since
the village is in such a state, but
take your time.<bw_break>

114607.en:
This village has been the target of a nasty bird called Darkflame. It has only recently appeared, but it flies
into our village every day and attacks people. Even if it weren't for that, it would be difficult to live in this
world surrounded by flames, and yet we are having a hard time at all. That's why the young people of the village
have set their minds to take down the beast, but it hasn't come back yet.
114607.ja:

114608.en:
Oh, my. Looking at your outfit, it seems that you are also a traveler from Asutoru or somewhere else. It's
not often that travelers from other places come to our village, so why did they suddenly start coming?

114609.en:
Leading Darkflame's strike force was a burly young man named Rezero. He is their leader. Rezero has a younger
brother named Gidda, who is the opposite of his brother. I wonder if he will make it back alive.

114610.en:
I asked for help from the Nadraga cult, but Estella-sama was the only one who came. We can only hope that
the men from the village who went out a few days ago will be able to stop Darkflame.
114610.ja:
ã€ŒãƒŠãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¬æ•™å›£ã«ã€€åŠ©ã‘ã‚’é ¼ã‚“ã ã®ã« ã€€æ¥ã¦ãã‚ŒãŸã®ãŒã€€ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ©ã•ã¾ ã€€ãŠã²ã¨ã‚Šã ã‘ã ãªã‚“ã¦â€¦â€¦ã€‚
ã€Œæ•°æ—¥å‰ã«å‡ºã‹ã‘ã¦ã„ã£ãŸã€€æ‘ã®ç”·ãŸã¡ãŒ ã€€é­”ç‚é³¥ã‚’ã€€ã—ã¨ã‚ã¦ãã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã† ã€€ç¥ˆã‚‹ã—ã‹ãªã„ã‚ã­â€¦â€¦ã€‚

114611.en:
What a thing to say. All the young men of the village have come together to fight, and only Gidda has returned.
There is no one left to fight Darkflame. This village is finished!

114612.en:
I feel a little sorry for you, brother Gidda. It's Darkflame's fault, isn't it? Nobody would be dead if it weren't
for him. Well, didn't the Elder tell you to take a break at the inn? There's one down the street to the
east.
114612.ja:
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ã‚®ãƒ€å…„ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ ã€€ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨ã€€ã‹ã‚ã„ãã†ã ã£ãŸãªã€‚
ã€Œæ‚ªã„ã®ã¯ã€€é­”ç‚é³¥ã ã‚ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã ã£ã¦ã€€ãã„ã¤ãŒã„ãªã‘ã‚Šã‚ƒ ã€€èª°ã‚‚ã€€æ­»ã‚“ã ã‚Šã—ãªã‹ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã‚‚ã‚“ã€‚
ã€Œãã†ã„ã‚„ã€€ã‚ã‚“ãŸã¯ã€€é•·è€ã•ã‚“ã« ã€€å®¿å±‹ã§ä¼‘ã‚€ã‚ˆã†ã€€è¨€ã‚ã‚Œã¦ãªã‹ã£ãŸï¼Ÿ ã€€ã“ã®å…ˆã‚’ã€€æ±ã«è¡Œã‘ã°ã€€ã‚ã‚‹ã‚ˆã€‚

114613.en:
Even if all the young men in the village had come together, they would have been no match for him. Even my
son knew how to fight. But I had no idea that Darkflame was such a formidable opponent. We too must be
prepared.

114614.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>It's over. This village is doomed to
be burned and extinguished by
Darkflame!

114615.en:
Everyone in the village looks sad. I
wonder what happened.

114616.en:
Gida is back, but why aren't the others back? I wonder if they are playing somewhere. I was planning to
ask him to play his harp with the others later.

114617.en:
Only the worthless Gidda survived, and Rezero's was left to die. Gidda's brother Rezero was a strong,
responsible, strong dragon man, unlike his brother. If he had lived, there would have been hope. Excuse me. This
is none of your business. You must be tired. I've spoken to the innkeeper.

114618.en: <attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Ugh, honey. Why didn't you come back?

114619.en:
Oh. You must be ? Chief Neoru told me all about you. What are you going to do? You want to take a
break now?

114620.en:
Oh, okay. Whenever you need a break,
just give me a call.

114621.en: Well then, have a good rest.

114622.en:
The Rezero is dead? I can't believe it. Rezero was a really strong man. He protected us from the monsters that
entered our village many times.

114623.en:
Traveler. I'm not going to say anything bad. Leave this village now. Darkflame may come to attack the
village. If that happens, no one will survive.

114624.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Rezero and all the others were killed
and only Gida came back. I never
thought this would happen.

114625.en:
It's not too late. We can go to the Nadraga cult again and ask for help! But all that's left in the village are
old people, women and children. Even that may be difficult.

114626.en:
Gyda has recovered thanks to the priest's care and attention. What does it matter? Now that Rezero is dead,
Darkflame has no equal.

114627.en:
I'm watching for Darkflame. If they do, we need to get the hell out of here. I don't know where we're going,
but it's better than doing nothing.

114628.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>I heard that all the men who went to
take down Darkflame have been wiped
out except for Gidda. Oh, my God.

114629.en:
With no one to defeat Darkflame and no help from the Order of Nadraga, we are now out of options. There is nowhere
left for us to run. We must wait for our demise. You should return to your home world before you are caught in
the middle. Leave this village behind.

114630.en:
Gida is still being attended to by the priest-sama. If you want to check on her, do as you please. Gida's house is
the easternmost of the three houses in the north of the village.

114631.en:
Even if Gidda's injuries are healed, she can't fight Darkflame by herself. The only one who came from the Nadraga
Order is the female priestess alone, so there may be nothing we can do now.

114632.en:
There are legends that this place is protected by a sacred bird, but that's just a myth. No one is going to help
us.

114633.en:
Gida seems to have gone out of the village. Are his injuries better now? No. We'll all be dead soon anyway. It
doesn't matter if he's hurt or not.

114634.en:
Gida said that he and the priest lady were going to go to Firetree Hill. Firetree Hill is a hill full of
burning trees just south of the village. I wonder what he wanted to do there.

114636.en:
Gidda and the priestess went out of the village together. Where did they go at a time like this? They didn't
run away together without us, did they?

114637.en:
Just now, Gida came back and said he and the priest lady are going to Hell's Valley. Hell's Valley is east
of the village. I heard there is Darkflame's Nest, but I don't know if it's okay to go there. I heard that if
you go to Hell's Valley or some other place like a cave, you can't escape from the monsters if you get into a
fight.
114637.ja:

114638.en:
We are saved. We are no longer attacked by Darkflame. It's still a harsh world surrounded by flames, but
we will be able to continue to live here somehow. I'm glad you came to this village. Thank you, thank you,
thank you.

114639.en:
I will never waste the thought of my brother, who believed in me to the very end and entrusted me with his
future. I don't have your strength right now, but I will become stronger and protect this village. You have
taken such good care of me. I can't repay you in any way, but I will pray for your safe journey from here.

114640.en:
What's that? I thought you were going to Holy City Ejarna? Didn't the priestess give you a letter of
introduction? Holy City Ejarna is just outside the village on the west side of the bridge. The entrance is where
the soldiers are watching.

114641.en:
I never thought I would see the legendary Flamia in my lifetime. There have been many hard times, but I'm
glad I lived to this age.

114642.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>If Darkflame is gone, we can continue
to live. As long as the water in the
fountain doesn't run dry.

114643.en:
Darkflame won't attack us anymore, but we will have to continue to live in this harsh land. But we will do our
best to survive. If we don't, we won't be able to bring up the dead Rezero and the others, will we?

114644.en:
I heard that Estella, the priestess, realized that Darkflame is Flamia after hearing Gidda's story. That's
the Priestess of the Nadraga cult. You have wonderful insight. As a woman of the dragon tribe, I admire you!

114645.en:
I see. All the older brothers and uncles in the village died, didn't they? Grandpa told me that a beautiful
bird took them to heaven.
114645.ja:
ã€Œãã£ã‹â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€æ‘ã®ãŠå…„ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã‚„ã€€ãŠã˜ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ãŸã¡ã¯ ã€€ã¿ã‚“ãªã€€æ­»ã‚“ã˜ã‚ƒã£ãŸã‚“ã ã­â€¦â€¦ã€‚
ã€Œãã‚Œã„ãªé³¥ã•ã‚“ãŒã€€å¤©å›½ã¸ ã€€é€£ã‚Œã¦ã£ã¦ãã‚ŒãŸã‚“ã ã£ã¦ ã€€ãŠã˜ã„ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ãŒã€€æ•™ãˆã¦ãã‚ŒãŸã®ã€‚

114646.en:
What on earth could Flamia, the defender of the Fire Realm, have been taken in by the power of darkness?
What on earth is going on? Is it possible that some great, evil power is trying to envelop this world? I
hope the Nadraga cult knows about this and acts. Please be careful.

114647.en:
Flamia flew away and for a moment I saw her as my husband. He had departed with Flamia to a place of rest, right?
So I will not grieve anymore. I will live strongly for her.

114648.en:
The legend of the sacred bird was true. But I had no idea that Flamia had turned into Darkflame. What would
have become of us if Gidda had been killed as well? It is frightening to think about it now.

114649.en:
You and Estella the priestess. And thanks to Gidda's hard work, the dreaded Darkflame is gone. Many men
died, but those of us who are left will do our best to rebuild this village!

114650.en:
I never thought that Gidda had the courage to face Darkflame again. No. It's all thanks to the help of you and
the priest. Thank you very much.

114651.en:
I heard you are going to Holy City Ejarna. When you get there, you should visit the Great Temple of the Nadraga
Order. If you are lucky, you may be able to see the Patriarch. He is a wonderful man!

114652.en:
Well done for coming . I am so relieved to hear that you are safe. I see that you went to Holy City
Ejarna. Have you met Patriarch Orstov of the Nadraga Order yet? I have met Patriarch Orstov only once, but I was
surprised to find him more friendly than I expected.

114653.en:
What's that? Are you the one from the other trip? You already went to Holy City Ejarna, didn't you? I love it. I
love it. I want to go there at least once. I heard it's a big city and there must be a lot of big buildings.

122922.en:
Be prepared to use Dragon Prayer in
the Character Settings Frequently Used
Lines setting in the Misc. command.

122923.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr><turn_pc>I'm sorry. I'm Kunai, I'm not talking
to anyone right now.

122924.en:
true When the red flame turns to the color of darkness, the legendary holy bird will appear. Its fluttering will
dispel all darkness. A fairy tale I heard when I was a child. Now I'm in the mood for a story like this.
122924.ja:

123410.en:
It looks like you had a good rest. Next time, I'll ask you to pay for your stay, but if you like, you can
stay here again. Oh? It looks like people are gathering outside the inn. Did something happen?
123410.ja:
ã€Œã‚ˆãã€€ä¼‘ã‚ãŸã‚ˆã†ã ã­ã€‚ ã€€æ¬¡ã‹ã‚‰ã¯ã€€ãŠä»£ã‚’ã„ãŸã ãã‘ã© ã€€ã‚ˆã‹ã£ãŸã‚‰ã€€ã¾ãŸã€€æ³Šã¾ã£ã¦ã„ã£ã¦ãŠãã‚Œã€‚

125343.en:
You are a traveler from somewhere else. If you are traveling in the Fire Realm, please purchase our Safe
Passage Mist. It is a secret formula of the dragon tribe, and it will protect you from the heat of the lava
on the ground! It is also very effective against other types of lava! Even poisonous swamps turn into mere
swamps! However, the effect wears off after a while, so I recommend that you bring a few things with you. Also,
please note that it will overwrite the effect of a warm fountain or bungee jump. See you soon.
125343.ja:

131783.en:
Oh. Thank you for restoring Flamia to its original form along with Gidda. Thank you for your
help on that occasion. By the way, I heard from a merchant from Ejarna that a path has been opened to a new land
called the Ice Realm. Ice is colder than water, it seems. We live in such a place that we have never seen such a
thing. So, I would like to ask you a question. I would like to receive ice, no matter what. I know it's asking a
lot, but could you please bring back some ice from the Ice Realm?

131784.en:
Oh, you will take care of it? I'm sorry to trouble you from so far away from home. Rumor has it that ice
reverts to water in hot places. I wonder if it is possible to bring it to this realm. I heard that there are
dragon people living in the Ice Realm as well as us, and they might know something. I am sorry to impose this
difficult task on you, but I ask you for your cooperation. Please deliver the ice to me.

131785.en:
I appreciate your kind words, but seems to be in need of a favor. I'm not in a hurry, so when you
get a spare moment, will you do me a favor?

131787.en:
Ice is colder than water, they say. We live in such a place that we have never seen such a thing. So we would
like to bring back some ice from the Ice Realm.

131788.en:
Rumor has it that ice reverts to water in hot places. I wonder if it is possible to bring it to this realm.
There are dragon people living in the Ice Realm as well as us, and they might know something about it. I am
sorry to impose this difficult task on you, but I ask you for your cooperation. Please deliver the ice to
me.

131789.en:
Oh-ho! is holding it in his hand! Did you bring back some ice from the Ice Realm? Well then, let's
eat it right away!

131791.en:
Oh, oh, oh. This is ice. How beautiful and cold. Thank you very much. To tell the truth, I have a son of my own. He
was a lazy, clumsy, and inadequate son who did not possess the prowess of Rezero or the talent of Gidda. In the
end, he was scattered with Rezero and the others as a warrior. My son was hot and sweaty. I will offer this ice
to his tomb.

131792.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr><icon_exc>Oops, this is not the time to talk!
I'll be there before the ice melts.

131794.en:
<pc> gave Fur-wrapped Ice to
Chief Neoru!

131795.en:
I offered the ice I received from to the tomb and it immediately melted and turned into
steam and ascended to the heavens. I am sure it reached my son in his resting place. I could see his joyful
face.

131796.en:
Thanks to , I was able to make a connection with the dragon tribe in the Ice Realm, and I would
like to start exchanges with them. I heard that the environment in the other side of the village is also
harsh. We will deliver Warmaline and fuel to them, and they will send us ice. If such a trade route is
established, fewer people will die from the heat and cold, and we will be able to save each other. Please come
visit us again in Apeca.You are always welcome.

134121.en:
I offered the ice I received from to the tomb and it immediately melted and turned into
steam and ascended to the heavens. I am sure it reached my son in his resting place. I could see his joyful
face. Thank you so much for granting the old man's wish. Please accept this as a token of my gratitude.

Thanks to , I was able to make a connection with the dragon tribe in the Ice Realm, and I would
like to start exchanges with them. I heard that the environment in the other side of the village is also
harsh. We will deliver Warmaline and fuel to them, and they will send us ice. If such a trade route is
established, fewer people will die from the heat and cold, and we will be able to save each other. Please come

134408.en:
Chief Neoru went off to visit the tomb, looking very respectful of the ice. When he returned shortly after,
he had a few tears on his cheeks. Let's talk to Chief Neoru again.

138365.en:
Do you know Liisan? A woman who lives in this village asked me the other day where she could find Fiery Fruit.
Fiery Fruit is a hot fiery fruit. In this village, it has long been a custom to make an offering to the
altar of Lord Nadraga. The only place where it can be found is Hell's Valley. As you know, it is a very
dangerous place.

138366.en:
Oh, thank you, thank you. We can kill two birds with one stone by making an offering, which has been missing since
the battle with Darkflame. The offering is of red ripe Fiery Fruit. <%nev_que_t_num0> would be enough.
They should grow wild in the upper Hell's Valley. <%nev_que_t_num0>When you have collected them, please give
them to Liisan.Thank you very much.

138367.en:
Oh, thank you, thank you. But you seem to have a lot of requests. Please come back when you have finished your other
requests. Until then, I'll hold Liisan back.
138367.ja:

138368.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Ugh, tamenuri. I will remind Liisan
not to take life so lightly.

138369.en:
Oh, thank you, thank you. I can kill two birds with one stone by making an offering, which I haven't been able to
do since the battle with Darkflame.

138370.en:
The offerings are red ripe Fiery Fruits.<%nev_que_t_num0> would be enough. They should grow wild in the
upper Hell's Valley. <%nev_que_t_num0>When you have collected them, please give them to
Liisan.Thank you very much.

138371.en:
It was my husband's job to collect Fiery Fruit until he left for his resting place in the war against
Darkflame. But the strong men of the village are gone.Someone from the village must do it. I will replace my
husband. Agon says I should stop, but the offering to Nadraga is what everyone in the village has been
waiting for.

138372.en:
Oh, that's the Fiery Fruit!As expected
of the hero who saved the village.<open_irai><bw_break>

138373.en:
This is all I need.Give them to Liisan
before he goes to Hell's Valley.

138375.en:
Oh, no. I thought you had come to
deliver it to me at Agon's request.

138376.en:
I cannot accept it.Agon asked me to collect Fiery Fruit for you. Seeing those fruits gives me courage. Thanks
to , I finally made up my mind. I'm going to go and collect the fruits now. It was my husband's job to
collect Fiery Fruit until he left for his resting place in the battle against Darkflame. Our offering to
Nadraga is our gratitude for being able to live in this harsh land engulfed in flames. Neither Nadraga
nor my husband would be pleased if we relied on someone other than the Apeka Village people to make the offering.

Would you like to give Fiery Fruit to
Liisan?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

138378.en:
<pc> tried to give Liisan the
Fiery Fruit!

138379.en:
Oh, that's the Fiery Fruit!That's the Fiery Fruit! As expected of the hero who saved the village. This should be
enough.Give it to Liisan before he goes to Hell's Valley.
138379.ja:
ã€ŒãŠãŠâ€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ãã‚Œã¯ã€€ã¾ã•ã—ãã€€è±Šç‚ã®å®Ÿï¼ ã€€ã•ã™ãŒã¯ã€€æ‘ã‚’æ•‘ã£ãŸã€€è‹±é›„ã˜ã‚ƒãªã€‚

138380.en:
I'm sure Liisan won't say anything about going to Hell's Valley when he sees the Fiery Fruit. Please deliver
them quickly.

138381.en:
I'm not sure what that means. Did Liisan say such a thing without receiving the Fiery Fruit? It is
meaningless to rely on a stranger who is not from Apeka Village to make an offering. You are absolutely right. We
Apeka Village people have been offering our gratitude to Lord Nadraga with our own strength. However, there
is no one strong enough in the current Apeka Village to gather Fiery Fruit from Hell's Valley.

138382.en:
However, I also have a desire to believe in the strength of the Apeka Village people. You. If there is fresh
Fiery Fruit on the altar of the fort, will you let me know? Liisan. The current Apeka villagers. I want to
know if they can really accomplish this with their own strength.

138383.en:
Thanks to you, I have made up my mind. I'm off to collect Fiery Fruit. I'm going to replace my husband with a
fine one. Please give the Fiery Fruit that collected to Mr. Agon.

138384.en:
Would you give the Fiery Fruit to
Agon, explaining why Liisan refused to
accept the Fiery Fruit?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

138385.en:
<pc> gave the Fiery Fruit to
Agon, explaining why Liisan refused to
accept the Fiery Fruit.

138386.en:
I, too, am inclined to believe in the
strength of the Apeka Villagers who
have been pushed aside.<open_irai><bw_break>

138387.en:
You. If there is fresh Fiery Fruit in the altar of the fortress, will you let me know? Liisan. I want to know if
the current Apeka villagers I want to know if they can really accomplish this with their own strength.

138388.en:
Thanks to you, I have made up my mind.
I'm off to collect Fiery Fruit. I'm
going to replace my husband.

138389.en:
I see.Liisan, you really did it. All I did was think about getting help from a strong man like you, but I didn't
try to live a strong life myself. It's not just me.Everyone in the village has lost the courage to live strong
because of Darkflame.

138390.en:
It might be the Fiery Fruit you picked that gave Liisan courage. And the courage Liisan received will be passed
on to the people of Apeka Village by seeing the Fiery Fruit offered to the altar. With your courage, the people
of Apeka Village will be able to live strongly. I have such a feeling. You not only defeated Darkflame and saved
the village, but you also gave us the courage to live strongly. I thank you as much as I can.

138391.en:
I, too, will not be defeated! With the
courage you gave me, I will live
strongly together with the villagers!

138392.en:
I was able to accomplish this.I am sure that the people of Apeka Village and my husband who has gone to his
resting place will be happy. I will not grieve anymore.I will live strongly for him.

138393.en:
<pc> informed Agon that
fresh Fiery Fruit had been offered to
the altar of the hut.

138394.en:
As always, this is a harsh world of
flames, but we are strong and alive!

138395.en:
I was able to accomplish this.I am sure that the people of Apeka Village and my husband who has gone to his
resting place will be happy. I will not grieve anymore.I will live strongly for him.

139183.en:
The strong men of the village are gone.From now on, women, children, and old people must support this village.
That is why I have decided to live as strong as my husband. I will gather Fiery Fruit with my strength! Please
don't be offended.Please give the Fiery Fruit to Mr. Agon.

139419.en:
But Liisan... He didn't even hear me stop him. He said he was going to Hell's Valley to pick Fiery Fruit! If
things continue as they are, Liisan will inevitably end up in danger. So, I have a favor to ask of you. I have a
request! I want you to pick up the Fiery Fruit before Liisan does and give it to him.

139536.en:
If there is fresh Fiery Fruit at the
altar of the castle, please let me
know.

179199.en:
You came well . Have you been well since then? When I was invited to the church banquet, I was
so nervous that my hand trembled holding the harp, but everyone listened to me quietly. You and my
brother's thoughtfulness have brought us together with many different people. Thank you very much.

179200.en:
What's that? Are you the traveler from back in the day? I heard rumors that you've traveled all over the world,
not just the Holy City. That's amazing! I'd like to visit other realms at least once. Just imagining
drinking that salty water that never runs out, is just too much for me...

179201.en:
I feel like the amount of water in this fountain has been increasing lately. Could it be a blessing from
God?

179202.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>For the sake of our children's future,
we must work energetically!

179203.en:
While I was looking at the sky, a beautiful bird flew into the western sky, burning brightly! I waved my hand
and said, ''Thank you for taking my brothers and uncles to heaven. Hehehe.

179204.en:
I am old, and the day when Flamia will lead me to a place of rest is not far away. Until then, I will try to live
as best I can. Otherwise, I will not have a face to match the young people of the village in the afterlife.

179205.en:
Many men died, but those of us who are
left will do our best to rebuild this
village!

179206.en:
It's a great thing that the unreliable Gidda was invited to the Order's banquet by name. I'm sure his brother
Rezero is pleased to see him in the afterlife.

179207.en:
Patriarch Orstov of the Nadraga Order has passed away and a young priest has succeeded him. A messenger from Ejarna
came and explained everything to me. I was surprised that they are so attentive to things in such a rural
area!
